   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to tsudoku's documentation!
===================================

**tsudoku** is a simple sudoku game you can play from the comfort of your terminal.

Check out the :doc:`README` README for further information on how to get started.

.. note::

   While this project is complete and ready for official release, this documentation is still currently in development.

   README.md
   API
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   :glob:
